review: I love it!!! I can watch TV for hours on end.

review: Love it!! Better than Apple TV!!

review: Love the Stick the wireless streams great and is super fast overall and very user friendly

review: Disappointed that Youtube is not included

review: The ram, memory, etc is as advertised. Speedy little device that barely puts a dent in your pocket. I used to use the amazon prime app on my xbox and this is easily 5x as fast as my xbox with the menu, loading, buffering, etc.
author: Chad S Smith

review: The Fire TV stick is easy set up and has a smooth transition between screens. We have the Rojo as well and this is our favorite between the devices.
author: Amazon Customer
